mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_ACCESORY_LIST (PKID, PART_CODE, ACCESSORY_NAME, ACCESSORY_CODE) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accessoryName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sctrans.T_TO_ACCESORY_LIST
PKID,
PART_CODE,
ACCESSORY_NAME,
ACCESSORY_CODE,
#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{accessoryName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_ACCESORY_LIST
PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORY_NAME = #{accessoryName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ACCESSORY_CODE = #{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from sctrans.T_TO_ACCESORY_LIST where 1=1
and PART_CODE = #{partCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ACCESSORY_CODE like '%'+ #{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} +'%'
select ACCESSORY_NAME from sctrans.T_TO_ACCESORY_LIST where 1=1 and ACCESSORY_CODE = #{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from sctrans.T_TO_ACCESORY_LIST where 1=1 and ACCESSORY_CODE = #{accessoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
